title: Executive Order 5432-Public Water Restoration No. 65, California
content: So much of the order of withdrawal dated January 24, 1914, creating Public Water Reserve No. 14, as affects the land hereinafter listed is hereby revoked, and all such land not otherwise reserved or withdrawn is hereby restored to the public domain and shall become subject to disposition under the laws applicable thereto upon such date and after such notice as may be hereafter determined and announced.
T. 3 S., R. 5 E., sec. 18, SE. ¼ SW. ¼.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5432-Public Water Restoration No. 65, California Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/373055
